Text.Page:
The hyenas around here are still...problematic. And I know you're a problem-solver, aren't you?

Kill the {@LinkCreature:18#111#dirty hyenas} and {@LinkCreature:18#112#ravenous hyenas}. I know I asked for hearts last time, but let's go with teeth, just to keep the spirits guessing.

But don't bring the teeth to me! Gods, no! Give them to Tirian in Camp Marrakeen, and watch the look on his face.
So...teeth. From hyenas. This was Kardelen's idea, right? Figures.
Your hands are bloody but empty. Get back out there!
